params.token: The vault token to get the price of.

returns._0: price USD price of token in 18 decimals.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.tokens: list of tokens to set stablecoin pool references

params.gaps: Corresponding list of time gaps to set for each token.
params.tokens: List of token addresses for which time gaps will be set.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

stablePools.details: Mapping from token address to Uni V3 pool of token/(USDT|USDC|DAI) pair

INPUT_ARRAY_MISMATCH().notice: Thrown when the lengths of input arrays do not match.

NO_MEAN(address).notice: Thrown when no mean price is set for the token.

NO_STABLEPOOL(address).notice: Thrown when no stable pool exists for the token.

TOO_LONG_DELAY(uint256).notice: Thrown when the delay time exceeds allowed limits.

TOO_LOW_MEAN(uint256).notice: Thrown when the mean price is below the acceptable threshold.

ZERO_ADDRESS().notice: Thrown when the address provided is the zero address.

SetTimeGap(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a time gap for a specific token is set or updated.

getPrice(address).notice: Return USD price of given token, multiplied by 10**18.

setStablePools(address[],address[]).notice: Set stablecoin pools for multiple tokens

setTimeGap(address[],uint256[]).notice: Allows the owner to set time gaps for a list of tokens.  The time gap is used to determine the acceptable age of the oracle data.

timeGaps(address).notice: A mapping that associates each token address with its respective time gap. Time gap represents the acceptable age of the data before it is considered outdated.

userdoc.notice: Oracle contract which provides price feeds of tokens from Uni V3 pool paired with stablecoins
